
```{r make_plot}

  filter(year == 1962) %>%
  select(-"Europe", "Oceania")
  ggplot(aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) + geom_point() +
  facet_wrap("continent")
```
